text: The Burkinabe ambassador in Berlin is the official representative of the Government in Ouagadougou to the Government of Germany. He is concurrently accredited in Tallinn (Estonia). == List of Representatives == {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Observations !| List of Prime Ministers of Burkina Faso !| List of Chancellors of Germany !| Term end |- | |Christophe Kalenzaga | |Maurice Yaméogo |Konrad Adenauer | |- | |Henri Guissou |Henri Guissou was born in 1910 in Wagudugu, the capital of today's Republic of Upper Volta. After attending school in his home country he went to the well-known teacher's college William Ponty in Dakar,Henri Guissou |Maurice Yaméogo |Ludwig Erhard | |- | |Pierre Ilboudo | |Maurice Yaméogo |Kurt Georg Kiesinger | |- | |Aissé Mensah | |Gérard Kango Ouédraogo |Willy Brandt | |- | |Tiémoko Marc Garango | |Sangoulé Lamizana |Helmut Schmidt | |- | |Gomtirbou Anatole Tiendrebeogo | |Saye Zerbo |Helmut Schmidt | |- | |Marie Savadogo |(* 1952) 1986 formerly a member of the embassy in Bonn |Thomas Sankara |Helmut Kohl | |- | |Moumouni Fabre | |Thomas Sankara |Helmut Kohl | |- | |Sophie Sow | |Thomas Sankara |Helmut Kohl | |- | |Jean- Baptiste Ilboudo | |Roch Marc Christian Kaboré |Helmut Kohl | |- | |Xavier Niodogo |Xavier Niodogo |Paramanga Ernest Yonli |Gerhard Schröder | |- | | | |Luc-Adolphe Tiao |Angela Merkel | |- | |Simplice Honore Guibila | |Isaac Zida |Angela Merkel | |} == References == Germany Burkina Faso
title: List of ambassadors of Burkina Faso to Germany
